segments.source_content:
---
slug: /157
title: "This Week In React #157: Concurrent Mode, RSC DevTools Extension, Gatsby, Radix asChild, Suspense, hydration, useMemo, React-Redux, Fresh, TinyBase, Worklets, TFLite, local_modules, Bootsplash..."
authors: [slorber]
date: 08-22-2023
---
It's been pretty quiet on the React front this week, but we've still got a few nice articles to read.

translations.zh-hant: 本週 React 生態圈相對平靜，但仍有幾篇不錯的文章值得一讀。

segments.source_content: On the React-Native side, Marc Rousavy is on fire, publishing a number of packages that seem to herald the imminent arrival of VisionCamera v3.

translations.zh-hant: 在 React-Native 方面，Marc Rousavy 火力全開，發布了多個預示 VisionCamera v3 即將到來的套件。

segments.source_content: We should have some nice releases soon, like [🐦 Bun 1.0](https://twitter.com/jarredsumner/status/1693657906917585359), [🐦 Astro 3.0](https://twitter.com/astrodotbuild/status/1693655809711108456) and [🐦 TanStack Router](https://twitter.com/tannerlinsley/status/1691936709498552654).

translations.zh-hant: 近期預計會有幾個重要版本發布，例如[🐦 Bun 1.0](https://twitter.com/jarredsumner/status/1693657906917585359)、[🐦 Astro 3.0](https://twitter.com/astrodotbuild/status/1693655809711108456)和[🐦 TanStack Router](https://twitter.com/tannerlinsley/status/1691936709498552654)。

segments.source_content: I'm taking a short break next week, so I'll see you on 6 September 👋

translations.zh-hant: 下週我將短暫休假，我們 9 月 6 日再見 👋

segments.source_content: **💡 [Check this newsletter on Twitter](https://slo.im/thread) - visual format 🎨**

translations.zh-hant: **💡 [在 Twitter 上查看本電子報](https://slo.im/thread) - 視覺化格式 🎨**
**[企業級 UI 開發（使用 React）：測試與程式碼品質](https://frontendmasters.com/courses/enterprise-ui-dev/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=thisweekinreact&utm_content=uidev)**

segments.source_content: Managing or migrating large apps and codebases? This video course covers what you need to know to scale efficiently whilst maintaining code quality. Covers unit testing, CI pipelines, mocking, code coverage, and more.

translations.zh-hant: 正在管理或遷移大型應用程式和程式碼庫？本影片課程涵蓋高效擴展同時保持程式碼品質所需知識，包括單元測試、CI 流程、模擬測試、程式碼覆蓋率等內容。

segments.source_content: A quite technical but greatly educational article that study the React codebase. Explains well how `startTransition` works and how it differs from the synchronous rendering mode. I learned how React uses the `MessageChannel` API recursively to periodically hand over to the main thread.

translations.zh-hant: 這是一篇技術性強但極具教育意義的文章，深入研究 React 程式碼庫。詳細解釋了 `startTransition` 的運作原理及其與同步渲染模式的差異。我從中了解到 React 如何遞迴使用 `MessageChannel` API 來定期交還主執行緒控制權。

segments.source_content:
- 💸 [Zero To Shipped - Master Fast-Paced Fullstack Development and **Finally** ship that product](https://www.zerotoshipped.com/)
- 🐦 [Is Gatsby Dead?](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1694392101281190224): not officially, but its future does not look super promising.
- 🎮 [React Jam - Summer 2023 Winners](https://reactjam.com/summer-2023-winners): the React-based video games creation challenge for which I was a member of the jury, just announced the winners.
- 📜 [Implement Radix's asChild pattern in React](https://www.jacobparis.com/content/react-as-child): explains how the `asChild` pattern, popularised by Radix, works as a good alternative to the `as` props for customising the underlying component.
- 📜 [A11y-Driven Development](https://www.simplethread.com/a11y-driven-development/): interesting proposal to split and name React components according to their accessibility role.
- 📜 [React Suspense in three different architectures](https://elanmed.dev/blog/suspense-in-different-architectures): presents 4 different `<Suspense>` use cases for 3 different architectures (CSR, SSR, RSC).
- 📜 [How to solve hydration error in Next.js](https://chirag-gupta.hashnode.dev/how-to-solve-hydration-error-in-nextjs): highlights some common problems that can lead to hydration problems, such as using browser APIs like `localStorage` to initialise your state, or using an invalid HTML markup.
- 📜 [Using PostHog with the Next.js App Router and Vercel](https://vercel.com/guides/posthog-nextjs-vercel-feature-flags-analytics)
- 📜 [useMemo overdose](https://edvins.io/usememo-overdose)
- 📦 [RSC Devtools - Chrome Extension](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/rsc-devtools/jcejahepddjnppkhomnidalpnnnemomn): the unofficial extension is now available in the Chrome store. It lets you navigate and analyse a timeline of RSC payloads over time. Read the article [Devtools for React Server Components](https://www.alvar.dev/blog/creating-devtools-for-react-server-components) for details.
- 📦 [Fresh 1.4 – Faster Page Loads, Layouts and More](https://deno.com/blog/fresh-1.4)
- 📦 [TinyBase 4.1 - New ui-react-dom module](https://tinybase.org/guides/releases/)
- 📦 [NextUI 2.1 - Select, Listbox, ScrollShadow](https://nextui.org/blog/v2.1.0)
- 📦 [React-Redux 9.0 alpha](https://github.com/reduxjs/react-redux/releases/tag/v9.0.0-alpha.0)
- 🎥 [tRPC + NextJS App Router = Simple Typesafe APIs](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qCLV0Iaq9zU)
- 🎥 [Remotion Lambda - Tutorial Playlist](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLRHdymbhXiIRgAeAUpMxe7l7BNliHfWUq)
- 🎥 [React Query is Secretly an Amazing State Manager](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0X3TlVklT-A)

translations.zh-hant:
- 💸 [Zero To Shipped - 掌握快節奏全端開發並**最終**推出產品](https://www.zerotoshipped.com/)
- 🐦 [Gatsby 死了嗎？](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1694392101281190224)：並非正式宣告，但它的未來看起來不太樂觀。
- 🎮 [React Jam - 2023 夏季獲獎者](https://reactjam.com/summer-2023-winners)：這個基於 React 的遊戲創作挑戰賽，我擔任評審之一，剛剛公佈了獲獎名單。
- 📜 [在 React 中實作 Radix 的 asChild 模式](https://www.jacobparis.com/content/react-as-child)：解釋 Radix 推廣的 `asChild` 模式如何作為替代 `as` 屬性的方案，用於自訂底層元件。
- 📜 [無障礙驅動開發](https://www.simplethread.com/a11y-driven-development/)：根據無障礙角色拆分和命名 React 元件的創新提案。
- 📜 [三種架構中的 React Suspense](https://elanmed.dev/blog/suspense-in-different-architectures)：針對 CSR、SSR、RSC 三種架構展示四種 `<Suspense>` 使用案例。
- 📜 [解決 Next.js 的 hydration 錯誤](https://chirag-gupta.hashnode.dev/how-to-solve-hydration-error-in-nextjs)：分析常見成因如用 `localStorage` 初始化狀態或無效 HTML 標記。
- 📜 [在 Next.js App Router 和 Vercel 中使用 PostHog](https://vercel.com/guides/posthog-nextjs-vercel-feature-flags-analytics)
- 📜 [useMemo 濫用](https://edvins.io/usememo-overdose)
- 📦 [RSC 開發工具 - Chrome 擴充功能](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/rsc-devtools/jcejahepddjnppkhomnidalpnnnemomn)：非官方工具現已上架，可分析 RSC 負載時間軸，詳見[文章](https://www.alvar.dev/blog/creating-devtools-for-react-server-components)。
- 📦 [Fresh 1.4 – 更快的頁面載入、佈局與更多功能](https://deno.com/blog/fresh-1.4)
- 📦 [TinyBase 4.1 - 新增 ui-react-dom 模組](https://tinybase.org/guides/releases/)
- 📦 [NextUI 2.1 - Select、Listbox、ScrollShadow](https://nextui.org/blog/v2.1.0)
- 📦 [React-Redux 9.0 alpha](https://github.com/reduxjs/react-redux/releases/tag/v9.0.0-alpha.0)
- 🎥 [tRPC + NextJS App Router = 簡易類型安全 API](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qCLV0Iaq9zU)
- 🎥 [Remotion Lambda 教學清單](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLRHdymbhXiIRgAeAUpMxe7l7BNliHfWUq)
- 🎥 [React Query 是隱藏的強大狀態管理器](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0X3TlVklT-A)

segments.source_content: Porkbun offers hundreds of domain extensions for React and React-Native developers from .dev and .app to .cloud, .xyz, and .ai — all at the **lowest prices around!** Every domain name at Porkbun comes with **tons of free features** like:

translations.zh-hant: Porkbun 為 React 和 React-Native 開發者提供數百種域名後綴，從 .dev、.app 到 .cloud、.xyz 和 .ai — 全部都是**最低價！** 在 Porkbun 註冊的每個域名都附帶**大量免費功能**，例如：

segments.source_content:
- SSL Certificates
- WHOIS Privacy
- DNS
- URL Forwarding
- Web and Email Hosting Trials

translations.zh-hant:
- SSL 憑證
- WHOIS 隱私保護
- DNS 服務
- URL 轉址
- 網站與電子郵件主機試用

segments.source_content: Check out our **AI Generated Search tool** that’s changing the way people look for domain names. All this is backed by **incredible support 365 days a year** plus thousands of real five-star reviews on Trustpilot.

translations.zh-hant: 體驗我們**AI 生成搜尋工具**，它正在徹底改變人們尋找網域名稱的方式。這一切由**全年無休的卓越技術支援**作為後盾，並在 Trustpilot 上獲得數千則真實五星評價。

segments.source_content: Click the link and [get $1 off your next domain name registration](https://porkbun.com/?coupon=TWIREACT&utm_source=TWIREACT&utm_medium=Newsletter&utm_campaign=twirjune2023) at Porkbun.com!

translations.zh-hant: 點擊連結立即[享受 1 美元網域註冊優惠](https://porkbun.com/?coupon=TWIREACT&utm_source=TWIREACT&utm_medium=Newsletter&utm_campaign=twirjune2023)，在 Porkbun.com 註冊您的網域！

segments.source_content:
- 💬 [React-Native RFC - Autolinking local modules](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/pull/702): proposes to make it easier to create local native modules, in a `local_modules` folder, using the `create-react-native-library` CLI.
- 💬 [React-Native-Testing-Library RFC - Jest Native matchers migration](https://github.com/callstack/react-native-testing-library/issues/1468)
- 🐦 [The top 100 Sports apps in the Apple App Store - React-Native 33/100](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1692215896029212847)
- 👀 [Expo Preview - Static Font Optimization with Expo Router](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1692990529800167441)
- 📜 [Simplify Your iOS Brownfield Integration with React Native Host](https://www.callstack.com/blog/simplify-your-ios-brownfield-integration-with-react-native-host)
- 📦 [react-native-worklets-core](https://github.com/margelo/react-native-worklets-core): a standalone worklet runner, inspired by the one in Reanimated 2+, and designed to be used by various libraries such as VisionCamera, WishList and Skia.
- 📦 [react-native-fast-tflite - High-performance TensorFlow Lite with GPU acceleration](https://github.com/mrousavy/react-native-fast-tflite)
- 📦 [Realm JavaScript v12: complete rewrite without surprises](https://medium.com/realm/realm-javascript-v12-complete-rewrite-without-surprises-62eea2a2e8ae)
- 📦 [react-native-bootsplash 5.0.0 - Dark mode, Brand image, Web support...](https://github.com/zoontek/react-native-bootsplash/releases/tag/5.0.0)
- 📦 [clean-rn - Clean all React Native caches](https://github.com/mrousavy/clean-rn)
- 🎥 [Instagram Stickers - “Can it be done in React Native?”](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5yM4NPcTwY4)
- 🎥 [Flutter vs React Native and Reanimated with @Reactiive](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A19-UEUrg6A)
- 🎙️ [React Native Radio 273 - Gluestack with Sanket Sahu](https://react-native-radio.simplecast.com/episodes/rnr-273-gluestack-with-sanket-sahu)
- 👥 [React Native EU 2023](https://www.react-native.eu/) (Wrocław, September 7–8, 2023) is offering us [-15% on conference tickets](https://ti.to/react-native-eu/2023/discount/thisweekinreact15) with code "thisweekinreact15".

zh-hant.translation:
- 💬 [React-Native RFC - 本地模組自動連結](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/pull/702)：提案透過 `create-react-native-library` CLI 在 `local_modules` 資料夾更簡便地建立本地原生模組
- 💬 [React-Native-Testing-Library RFC - Jest Native 匹配器遷移](https://github.com/callstack/react-native-testing-library/issues/1468)
- 🐦 [Apple App Store 前 100 大運動類應用 - React-Native 佔 33/100](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1692215896029212847)
- 👀 [Expo 預覽 - 使用 Expo Router 實現靜態字體優化](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1692990529800167441)
- 📜 [透過 React Native Host 簡化 iOS 棕地整合](https://www.callstack.com/blog/simplify-your-ios-brownfield-integration-with-react-native-host)
- 📦 [react-native-worklets-core](https://github.com/margelo/react-native-worklets-core)：獨立工作執行器，靈感來自 Reanimated 2+，可供 VisionCamera、WishList 和 Skia 等庫使用
- 📦 [react-native-fast-tflite - 支援 GPU 加速的高效能 TensorFlow Lite](https://github.com/mrousavy/react-native-fast-tflite)
- 📦 [Realm JavaScript v12：無意外完整重寫版](https://medium.com/realm/realm-javascript-v12-complete-rewrite-without-surprises-62eea2a2e8ae)
- 📦 [react-native-bootsplash 5.0.0 - 深色模式、品牌圖像、網頁支援...](https://github.com/zoontek/react-native-bootsplash/releases/tag/5.0.0)
- 📦 [clean-rn - 清除所有 React Native 快取](https://github.com/mrousavy/clean-rn)
- 🎥 [Instagram 貼紙 - 「能用 React Native 實現嗎？」](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5yM4NPcTwY4)
- 🎥 [Flutter 對決 React Native 和 Reanimated 與 @Reactiive](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A19-UEUrg6A)
- 🎙️ [React Native Radio 273 - Gluestack 專訪 Sanket Sahu](https://react-native-radio.simplecast.com/episodes/rnr-273-gluestack-with-sanket-sahu)
- 👥 [React Native EU 2023](https://www.react-native.eu/)（2023年9月7-8日，弗羅茨瓦夫）提供[-15%會議門票優惠](https://ti.to/react-native-eu/2023/discount/thisweekinreact15)，折扣碼「thisweekinreact15」
zh-hant.reason: Content of a non-translatable 'inlineCode' element was changed. Source: '`local_modules`', Translation: '`create-react-native-library`'.

segments.source_content:
- 👀 [Upcoming Node 20.6 - built-in .env file support](https://github.com/nodejs/node/pull/49185)
- 🐦 [requestIdleCallback coming to Safari and soon in every browser?](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1694260312986227187)
- 📜 [`Array<T>` vs `T[]`: Which is better?](https://www.totaltypescript.com/array-types-in-typescript)
- 📜 [Shadow DOM: Not by Default](https://begin.com/blog/posts/2023-08-18-shadow-dom-not-by-default)
- 📜 [Dropbox - How we reduced the size of our JavaScript bundles by 33%](https://dropbox.tech/frontend/how-we-reduced-the-size-of-our-javascript-bundles-by-33-percent)
- 📜 [Four new CSS features for smooth entry and exit animations](https://developer.chrome.com/blog/entry-exit-animations/)
- 📜 [The ideal viewport doesn’t exist](https://viewports.fyi/)
- 📜 [TypeScript is Surprisingly OK for Compilers](https://matklad.github.io/2023/08/17/typescript-is-surprisingly-ok-for-compilers.html)
- 📦 [Chrome 117 Beta](https://developer.chrome.com/blog/chrome-117-beta/)

translations.zh-hant:
- 👀 [即將推出的 Node 20.6 - 內建 .env 檔案支援](https://github.com/nodejs/node/pull/49185)

- 📜 [`Array<T>` vs `T[]`：哪個更好？](https://www.totaltypescript.com/array-types-in-typescript)
- 📜 [Shadow DOM：預設不啟用](https://begin.com/blog/posts/2023-08-18-shadow-dom-not-by-default)
- 📜 [Dropbox - 我們如何將 JavaScript 套件大小減少 33%](https://dropbox.tech/frontend/how-we-reduced-the-size-of-our-javascript-bundles-by-33-percent)
- 📜 [四項新 CSS 功能，實現流暢的進入與退出動畫](https://developer.chrome.com/blog/entry-exit-animations/)
- 📜 [理想的視口並不存在](https://viewports.fyi/)
- 📜 [TypeScript 用於編譯器出奇地合適](https://matklad.github.io/2023/08/17/typescript-is-surprisingly-ok-for-compilers.html)
